statements: SELECT * FROM patent_infringement_cases;
SELECT case_id, plaintiff_name, case_status FROM patent_infringement_cases;
SELECT defendant_name, patent_number, resolution_date FROM patent_infringement_cases;
SELECT * FROM patent_infringement_cases ORDER BY resolution_date DESC;
SELECT plaintiff_name, defendant_name FROM patent_infringement_cases WHERE case_status='Open';
SELECT * FROM patent_infringement_cases WHERE case_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY case_id DESC;
SELECT plaintiff_name, defendant_name FROM patent_infringement_cases WHERE resolution_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY resolution_date ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT patent_number FROM patent_infringement_cases WHERE plaintiff_name = 'Apple Inc.';
SELECT * FROM patent_infringement_cases WHERE resolution_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT plaintiff_name, COUNT(*) AS total_cases FROM patent_infringement_cases GROUP BY plaintiff_name HAVING total_cases > 1 ORDER BY total_cases DESC;
SELECT * FROM patent_infringement_cases WHERE case_status = 'Pending';
SELECT plaintiff_name, defendant_name FROM patent_infringement_cases WHERE resolution_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT resolution_type, resolution_description FROM case_resolutions WHERE resolution_date < '2022-05-01';
SELECT patent_number, case_status FROM patent_infringement_cases WHERE plaintiff_name = 'Apple Inc.';
SELECT * FROM case_resolutions WHERE resolution_type = 'Settlement' ORDER BY resolution_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM patent_infringement_cases WHERE case_status = 'pending' ORDER BY plaintiff_name DESC;
SELECT case_id, plaintiff_name, resolution_date FROM patent_infringement_cases WHERE resolution_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT defendant_name, resolution_type, resolution_description FROM patent_infringement_cases JOIN case_resolutions ON patent_infringement_cases.case_id = case_resolutions.case_id;
SELECT * FROM patent_infringement_cases WHERE plaintiff_name LIKE '%Smith%' OR defendant_name LIKE '%Johnson%' ORDER BY case_id;
SELECT patent_number, COUNT(*) AS case_count FROM patent_infringement_cases GROUP BY patent_number HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY case_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM patent_infringement_cases;
SELECT plaintiff, defendant, filing_date FROM patent_infringement_cases WHERE resolution_status='Pending';
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_companies ORDER BY founding_date DESC;
SELECT company_name, headquarters_location FROM pharmaceutical_companies WHERE company_name LIKE 'P%';
SELECT representative_name, law_firm, contact_email FROM legal_representatives WHERE contact_phone IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM patent_infringement_cases ORDER BY filing_date DESC;
SELECT case_id, plaintiff, resolution_status FROM patent_infringement_cases WHERE resolution_date IS NULL;
SELECT patent_number, filing_date, resolution_status FROM patent_infringement_cases WHERE defendant = 'Apple';
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_companies WHERE headquarters_location LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT company_name, ceo_name, founding_date FROM pharmaceutical_companies ORDER BY founding_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM patent_cases;
SELECT patent_number, plaintiff, defendant FROM patent_cases ORDER BY case_id DESC;
SELECT resolution_date, patent_number, case_status FROM patent_cases WHERE case_status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM case_evidence WHERE case_id_fk = 3;
SELECT case_id_fk, evidence_type, description FROM case_evidence ORDER BY case_id_fk, evidence_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM patent_cases WHERE defendant = 'Apple Inc.';
SELECT case_id, plaintiff, resolution_date FROM patent_cases WHERE resolution_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT patent_number, plaintiff, defendant, case_status FROM patent_cases WHERE case_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY patent_number DESC;
SELECT case_id, expense_type, amount FROM case_expenses WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM case_outcomes WHERE resolution_date < '2021-12-31' ORDER BY settlement_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM patent_cases WHERE plaintiff = 'Apple'
SELECT case_id, plaintiff, defendant FROM patent_cases WHERE filing_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT patent_number, filing_date, resolution_date FROM patent_cases ORDER BY filing_date DESC
SELECT * FROM resolutions WHERE resolution_type = 'Settlement'
SELECT lawyer_id, name, specialized_area FROM lawyers
SELECT * FROM patent_cases WHERE plaintiff='John Doe';
SELECT case_id, patent_number, defendant FROM patent_cases WHERE filing_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT plaintiff, defendant, resolution_type FROM patent_cases JOIN resolutions ON patent_cases.case_id = resolutions.case_id WHERE resolution_date IS NOT NULL ORDER BY plaintiff ASC, defendant DESC;

SELECT patent_number, COUNT(*) AS evidence_count FROM patent_cases JOIN patent_evidence ON patent_cases.case_id = patent_evidence.case_id GROUP BY patent_number HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY evidence_count DESC;
SELECT name AS lawyer_name, specialized_area AS specialization, email AS contact_email FROM lawyers WHERE specialized_area IS NOT NULL OR email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
